https://tmrev.io/movie/383962-Blue Dress 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/mCoy2LuMqxhuQj4GnvI9iduYH1w.jpg Surreal worlds, elegiac images and romantic letters form a stream of suppressed memories. A young man discovers diaries and film reels of his recently deceased mother. Ukrainian director Igor Minaev melts his rarely seen shorts from Soviet times into an emotional journey into the past. Blue Dress
